nutrients: Vitamin K, Vitamin E, Vitamin C, Potassium, Folate, Vitamin B5, Vitamin B6
description: Avocados are a great source of vitamins C, E, K, and B-6, as well as riboflavin, niacin, folate, pantothenic acid, magnesium, and potassium. They also provide lutein, beta-carotene, and omega-3 fatty acids.

nutrients: Vitamin B6, Vitamin C, Potassium, Magnesium, Copper, Manganese, Net Carbs, Fiber
description: Bananas are a good source of several vitamins and minerals, especially potassium, vitamin B6, and vitamin C. They are also a good source of fiber.

nutrients: Vitamin C, Fiber, Thiamine, Folate, Potassium, Antioxidants
description: Oranges are a good source of several vitamins and minerals, especially vitamin C, thiamine, folate, and potassium. They are also a good source of antioxidants.

nutrients: Vitamin C, Manganese, Folate, Potassium, Antioxidants, Fiber
description: Strawberries are a good source of several vitamins and minerals, especially vitamin C, manganese, and folate. They are also a good source of antioxidants.
